page.title: 13FASHION OF PONTESBURY YOUTH
page.content: Steve buys his clothes in Shrewsbury, usually at Burtons or Marks and Spencers. He spends about forty pounds a month on his clothes. His choice is tight trousers, patterned shirts and bright jumpers. He likes wearing short-sleeved shirts in the summer and in the winter he only wears long- sleeved shirts when he wears a tie. He wears a tie once a week, when he goes out. His favourite colours in trousers are blue, black and grey. He often wears black, white and grey shoes too. He likes his trousers to match his jumper and shirt. He prefers round necked jumpers, made of wool. He wears a suit if he is going somewhere special, like a wedding. He has a grey suit and a blue suit and often wears the jacket on its own with a separate pair of trousers - perhaps to a disco.
